author: CNN Staff
title: Beautiful outdoor cinemas
text:
(CNN) Save for a few quirky venues left to satiate the needs of nostalgic cinema goers, drive-in theaters are a relic of a past.
What hasn't faded, however, is the appeal of catching a flick in the great outdoors.
In fact, you could even say it's going through a revival.
Location specialist The Venue Report put together a list of the world's coolest outdoor cinemas, which we've featured in the above gallery.
Though many of these stunners are located at hotels and resorts -- there's even one in an RV park -- there are a few that are open to the general public.
Chances are, you'll be so enthralled with your surroundings you won't even care if the movie's a stinker.
